text:
Good morning!
This is the mattress cover and sheets for the white leather couch in my office, and they just came out of the dryer. Will you ladies please put sheets on the bed, leave it set up that way for a guest, and Iâ€™ll take care of the pillows?
Also, the pink silk pillow case goes on Tillyâ€™s pillow whenever it is clean. Same with Johnâ€™s monogrammed pillow case.
We just spent a huge effort getting the house organized, so if you donâ€™t know where something goes, please ask. Little by little, everything will have its place.
Also, all Aledo Bearcat clothes are Tillyâ€™s ğŸ¾ğŸ§¡
Reminder we donâ€™t put the large wooden handle knives in the dishwasher. Those are hand wash. (Smaller steak knives are fine.)
Side door is unlocked!
